EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2016-03-09-Turbofest-Silicon-Valley.02. 02_08_2016 Reminder Email/Announceme
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbofest Silicon Valley's Mystery Comedian Is...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://vmturbo.com/turbofest-silicon-valley??utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Turbofest-SV-Announcement&utm_content=02082016]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Turbofriend}}: It's the moment you’ve all been waiting for! We are thrilled to announce that Kumail Nanjiani from HBO’s hit show, Silicon Valley will be our celebrity comedian performing the evening of 3/9/16 at the AWS Pop Up Loft in San Francisco!
Turbofest is an opportunity for you to learn from VMTurbo and its technology partners about the next generation of cloud and virtualization. It features customer success keynotes, product sneak previews, and partner & analyst presentations. It is a chance to network with your peers, explore the next wave of IT innovation, and meet some of the brightest engineers in the world.
Due to space considerations, Turbofest Silicon Valley is limited to the first 100 VIP registrants. Register now! <[[http://vmturbo.com/turbofest-silicon-valley??utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Turbofest-SV-Announcement&utm_content=02082016]]>
#VMTurbofest
<[[http://vmturbo.com/turbofest-silicon-valley??utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Turbofest-SV-Announcement&utm_content=02082016]]> Kumail Nanjiani HBO's Silicon Valley
